welcome.hero_title: Discover, Rate, and Review the Best Games
welcome.hero_subtitle: Your home for honest game reviews and community ratings
welcome.discover_subtitle: Explore thousands of games across all platforms and genres
welcome.indie_games_desc: Discover amazing games from independent developers. Support creativity and innovation in game development.
welcome.no_indie_games: No indie games available at the moment. Check back soon!
welcome.signup_prompt: Sign up to read full reviews and rate games
welcome.how_it_works_desc: Sign up, rate your favorite games, and help others find the best experiences.
welcome.feature_user_reviews_desc: Share your gaming experiences and read honest opinions from other players.
welcome.feature_expert_reviews_desc: Get insights from professional game critics and industry experts.
welcome.feature_community_voting_desc: Vote on your favorite games and see what's trending in the community.
welcome.feature_discovery_tools_desc: Find new games based on your preferences and playing history.
welcome.feature_community_highlights_desc: See what games are popular among players with similar tastes.
welcome.community_highlights_desc: Join thousands of gamers sharing their passion and insights about the latest releases. Discover what's popular among players with similar tastes.
welcome.newsletter_desc: Sign up for our newsletter to get the latest game reviews and news.
welcome.footer_disclaimer: Game images and trademarks belong to their respective owners.
welcome.no_recent_releases: No recent releases available at the moment.
welcome.no_top_games: No top games available at the moment.
welcome.footer_social_description: Stay connected with the PlayScore community on social media!
welcome.footer_about_description: PlayScore is your destination to discover, rate, and track your favorite video games. Join our community of passionate gamers and share your gaming experience!

categories.hero_subtitle: Explore games by genre and discover new experiences

platforms.hero_subtitle: Discover games on all your favorite platforms

contact_page.hero_subtitle: Have questions, comments, or suggestions? Feel free to contact me!
contact_page.contact_info: Have a question about PlayScore? Want to collaborate or just say hello? Fill out the form and I'll get back to you as soon as possible.
contact_page.success_message: Thank you for your message! I'll get back to you as soon as possible.
contact_page.error_message: An error occurred while sending your message. Please try again later.
contact_page.more_questions: Have more questions? Feel free to contact me!
contact_page.future_plans_desc: PlayScore is constantly evolving! New features are in development.

about_page.hero_subtitle: A Video Game Review Platform Created by a Passionate Gamer
about_page.mission_text_1: PlayScore was born from a passion for video games and a desire to create a platform where players can discover, rate, and share their gaming experiences. This personal project aims to provide a space where authenticity and honesty are at the heart of every review.
about_page.mission_text_2: As the sole developer behind PlayScore, my goal is to build a platform that showcases both popular titles and indie games worth discovering. I firmly believe that every player should have access to reliable information to make informed choices in their gaming adventures.
about_page.value_authenticity_desc: I value honesty and impartial reviews based on real gaming experiences.
about_page.value_community_desc: I want to create an environment where players can share their experiences and learn from each other.
about_page.value_discovery_desc: PlayScore helps players discover new experiences across all platforms and genres.
about_page.value_accessibility_desc: I strive to make the platform accessible to all players, regardless of their preferences or experience level.
about_page.join_text: PlayScore is a constantly evolving project. Sign up to share your gaming experiences, discover new titles, and help grow this platform created with passion.

help.hero_subtitle: Learn how to make the most of your PlayScore experience
help.dashboard_overview_content: Your dashboard is your personal gaming hub. Here you can track your gaming activity, manage your wishlist, and see your rating history. The dashboard provides a comprehensive view of your gaming profile and preferences.
help.wishlist_content: The wishlist feature allows you to save games you're interested in. To add a game to your wishlist, browse the games catalog and click the "Add to Wishlist" button on any game card or game details page. You can view and manage your wishlist from your dashboard.
help.ratings_content: Share your gaming experience by rating games you've played. Your ratings help other users discover great games and also help us recommend games you might enjoy. To rate a game, visit the game details page and use the rating system to assign a score and optionally leave a review.
help.stats_content: Your stats section shows your gaming activity metrics, including games played, reviews written, wishlisted games, and liked games. These stats update automatically as you interact with games on the platform.
help.recommendations_content: Based on your ratings and gaming preferences, we provide personalized game recommendations. The more games you rate, the better our recommendations become. Explore the "Recommended For You" section on your dashboard to discover new games.
help.activity_content: The activity charts visualize your gaming trends over time. The ratings distribution chart shows how you tend to rate games, while the activity chart tracks your platform engagement over time.
help.pdf_content: You can generate PDF reports of your gaming profile, including your stats, ratings, and wishlist. This feature is available at the bottom of your dashboard.
help.contact_support: If you have any questions or need further assistance, please visit our Contact page or send us an email.

developer.overview: Manage your game submissions and monitor performance

dashboard.welcome_message: Welcome to your personal dashboard! Here you can track your game activity, manage your wishlist, and view your rating history. Start by browsing games, adding them to your wishlist, or rating games you've played.

messages.genre_required: Please select at least one genre.
messages.tags_optional: Tags are optional and help users find your game.
messages.video_requirements: Upload a video in MP4, WebM, or OGG format (max 20MB). This is optional but recommended.
messages.image_requirements: Upload an image in JPG, PNG, or GIF format (max 2MB).

messages.file_too_large: File is too large. Maximum size is 5MB.
messages.rawg_import_description: Import game data from the RAWG database to save time.

indie_games.hero_subtitle: Discover amazing games from independent developers
indie_games.section_description: Support independent developers by discovering and playing their creative works
indie_games.no_games: No indie games available at the moment. Check back soon!
indie_games.support_description: Independent game developers often work with limited resources but unlimited creativity. By playing and sharing indie games, you help these developers continue to create innovative and unique gaming experiences.
indie_games.feature_innovation_desc: Indie developers often experiment with new gameplay mechanics and storytelling techniques.
indie_games.feature_creativity_desc: Without corporate constraints, indie developers can express their unique creative vision.
indie_games.feature_passion_desc: Indie games are often passion projects, created with love and dedication by small teams.

notifications.check_notifications_description: Check the notification bell icon in the header to see your notifications about game approvals, comments, and other important updates.
